Legislation Database

Search and view all legislation introduced into Harlon's Parliament.

Categories
Showing 0 results out of 0 entries
Sorry, no results found for your search
Federation of Harlon   Administrative   18/01/2024
HB 3-092 City of Harlon General Property Limits Act
In the City of Harlon currently there is no limit on how many properties you can own. This can lead to abandoned districts (for example Faybury at the moment).
Federation of Harlon   Government Programs   04/01/2024
HB 3-094 Reformed Wiki Funding of 2023 Act
The Harlon wiki is a treasure chest of history for the server, and a guide on current events to players who are new to Harlon.
Federation of Harlon   Server Mechanics   04/01/2024
HB 3-091 Going Once, Going Twice, SOLD Act
The purpose of this bill is to implement an auction plugin within Harlon.
Federation of Harlon   Administrative   04/01/2024
HB 3-090 Government Publications Act
The purpose of this bill is to establish a standard for transparency reports from the government of Harlon.
Federation of Harlon   Budgetary   20/12/2023
HB 3-088 Tax Cuts and Changes of 2023 Act
The purpose of this bill is to bring reforms to the existing tax code that was previously passed in 2022.
Federation of Harlon   Government Programs   20/12/2023
HB 3-087 Deposit Insurance Act
Currently, there is no security for deposits made in a bank, which leaves people open to the risk of losing their money if a bank defaults on debt or closes down.
Federation of Harlon   Budgetary   06/12/2023
HB 3-086 December 2023 - January 2024 Budget
Federation of Harlon   Parliamentary Action   15/11/2023
GOV VOTE Westray Cabinet
This is the government proposal that the Harlon Progress Party wishes to propose to the House of Assembly and pass as the Ninth Administration of Harlon
Federation of Harlon   Administrative   25/09/2023
HB 3-081 Log On Act
Each MP serves a 6 month term (excluding those appointed or elected through prorated contexts such as by-elections).
Federation of Harlon   Administrative   25/09/2023
Criminal Code of the Federation of Harlon
Federation of Harlon   Administrative   25/09/2023
HB 3-080 Criminal Code Foundation Act
The purpose of this bill is to establish the criminal code of Harlon.
